laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial H/H was 9.6 and 33. On day of admission, H/H was 6.2/18.6 (rechecked 6.___/18.3).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased H/H from 9.6 and 33 to 6.2/18.6, indicating acute blood loss.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Cepheid nucleic acid amplification assay (Reference Range-Negative).
